name: WTF: Live Game Show
description:
WTF recognizes that we live in an unrecognizable world, but we’re experiencing it together: the highs, the lows, the uncertainty and of course all the WTF moments. WTF has real cash prizes, and it’s the first cryptocurrency-powered game show app in the world!

Games are played live every weekday at 5:30pm ET.

You can create a team of up to three players, and work together to win cash prizes. If at least one person from your team answers every question correctly, everyone on the team wins!

*Cash prizes are awarded in the form of cryptocurrency.*

Note: WTF is intended for people 13 years or older.

Twitter: @officiallywtf
Instagram: @officiallywtf

Privacy Policy: https://triviaappio.github.io/wtf-ancillary/privacy
Terms of Service: https://triviaappio.github.io/wtf-ancillary/terms
